name: Sushi Rolls (Working title)
description:
(Still in development)

This game is a multiplayer beat'em up type of game (as a reference you could say a it's a mix between Fall Guys and Gang Beast). 

The idea is to have multiple minigames and events that you could play either in teams or Free 4 All, I'm not talking about large teams of like 10-7 other player (looking at you Fall Guys), but rather smaller teams of 3 or 4 tops. 

I have a small demo with a general idea of what the game could look and play like, there's still much work to do but before that I want to make sure that it's core is fun and people like it. 

I would greatly appreciate feedback from others and see other people perspective on the game
